mapper.select: SELECT I.INSP_CD, I.DTL_INSP_CD AS DT_INSP_CD, I.DTL_INSP_NM AS DT_INSP_NM, I.UNIT, I.GENDER_CD, I.OCS_CD, E.EMR_NM AS OCS_NM, I.REF_HIGH_FIG, I.REF_LOW_FIG, NVL(I.RUN_YN,1) AS RUN_YN FROM SC_DTL_INSP I, SC_EMR_CODE E WHERE I.OCS_CD= E.EMR_CD AND INSP_CD = #{inspCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_DTL_INSP SET DTL_INSP_NM =#{dtInspNm}, UNIT =#{unit}, GENDER_CD =#{genderCd}, OCS_CD =#{ocsCd}, REF_HIGH_FIG =#{refHighFig}, REF_LOW_FIG =#{refLowFig}, RUN_YN =#{runYn}, MOD_ID =#{userId}, MOD_IP =#{userIp}, MOD_DATE =TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE INSP_CD =#{inspCd} AND DTL_INSP_CD =#{dtInspCd}

MERGE INTO SC_DTL_INSP USING DUAL ON (INSP_CD = #{inspCd} AND DTL_INSP_CD = #{dtInspCd}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( INSP_CD, DTL_INSP_CD, DTL_INSP_NM, UNIT, GENDER_CD, OCS_CD, REF_HIGH_FIG, REF_LOW_FIG, RUN_YN, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DATE ) VALUES( #{inspCd}, #{dtInspCd}, #{dtInspNm}, #{unit}, #{genderCd}, #{ocsCd}, #{refHighFig}, #{refLowFig}, #{runYn}, #{userId}, #{userIp}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') )
